text.div:
Vibriosis (Tests for Vibrionaceae species [except Toxigenic Vibrio cholera O1 and O139] Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    41857-4 Vibrio parahaemolyticus DNA [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    49609-1 Vibrio sp DNA [Identifier] in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    79384-4 Vibrio cholerae+parahaemolyticus rfbL+trkH+tnaA genes [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
    82200-7 Vibrio cholerae+parahaemolyticus+vulnificus DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with non-probe detection
    92686-5 Vibrio cholerae+parahaemolyticus+vulnificus DNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
